verses.name: Genesis 41:14
verses.text: Then Pharaoh sent and called Joseph, and they brought him hastily out of the dungeon: and he shaved himself, and changed his raiment, and came in unto Pharaoh.

verses.name: Genesis 41:15
verses.text: And Pharaoh said unto Joseph, I have dreamed a dream, and there is none that can interpret it: and I have heard say of thee, that thou canst understand a dream to interpret it.

verses.name: Genesis 41:16
verses.text: And Joseph answered Pharaoh, saying, It is not in me: God shall give Pharaoh an answer of peace.

verses.name: Genesis 41:17
verses.text: And Pharaoh said unto Joseph, In my dream, behold, I stood upon the bank of the river:
